name: dude-graph
description: Generic tool to visually represent a graph of connected blocks. It can be used for unreal-like blueprints, state machines, etc..
author: Jeremie Taboada <taboada.jeremie@gmail.com> - Jonathan Picques <jonathan.picques@gmail.com>

scripts.release-patch: bower version patch && npm version --no-git-tag-version patch
scripts.release-minor: bower version minor && npm version --no-git-tag-version minor
scripts.release-major: bower version major && npm version --no-git-tag-version major
